duties_responsibilities.duty: Business requirement gathering for medium to large initiatives with complex scope.
Identify business processes, document their workflow in process maps, and identify roles within these processes.
Assess configuration options to meet requirements and specifications.
Lead cross-functional collaboration and drives alignment with business partners within constraints of the project or work.

education_certification.credential: 2+ years demonstrated work experience in core human resources functions
In depth subject matter expertise in HRIS systems plus one of our People System platforms. Examples: Workday, Avature, Docebo or Dayforce
Experience providing requirements and mapping business processes for medium to large complex initiatives
Experience working with both agile and waterfall delivery methodologies
Strong written and verbal communication skills
